summary: An ordinance relating to, and modifying the street railway franchises of the Seattle and Rainier Valley Railway Company, relieving said company from future payments of gross earnings tax and from the furnishing of free transportation to police men and fire men, amending Sections 4 and 5 of Ordinance No. 15919, and Section 4 of Ordinance No. 20088 (as amended), and repealing Section 5 of Ordinance No. 20088.
